products.title: Choices Rosehip Leaf Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Let your home flourish with calmness and organic style with this choices rosehip leaf blue roller blind. This quaint pattern is reminiscent of emma bridgewaters earliest sketchbooks, full of afternoons spent drawing endless hawthorns, sloes and rosehips.

products.title: Thermal Luxe Dimout Teal & Spring Roller Blind
products.description: This thermal luxe dimout teal roller blind feels bright at the window. The blue-green textured blind is finished off with a collection of spring-like pom-poms made from tightly woven threads. Whether you have a bold, maritime look in your home or simply accents of blue and whit this thermal luxe dimout teal roller blind feels bright at the window.

products.title: Thermal Luxe Dimout Blue Mist & Henley Roller Blind
products.description: As if the scandi blue colourway of this thermal luxe blind wasnt trendy enough, it also has a chic, ever so slightly kitsch decorative trim, made from woven threads in soft cream and shades of blue, to give it even more style. products.title: Choices Daisy Spot Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Oh boy, weve spotted a remarkable design. The choices daisy spot blue roller blind pays homage to tradition with every turn. The pattern is born from emma bridgewaters pottery stamping technique, whilst the linen mix fabric emphasises the homely element she is so famed for.

products.title: Dill Teal Roller Blind
products.description: We just love the intensity of these blue-green tones. Graduated from light to richly dark at the bottom they will add plenty of vibrancy to your home. But what about that glorious clarissa hulse pattern? The burnt out silhouettes of the dill plant sprout up playfully from the bot we just love the intensity of these blue-green tones.

products.title: Meadow Teal Roller Blind
products.description: Ombre botanicals in beautiful blues and greens and printed on a stunning linen texture. We're not sure what more you could ask for from a window dressing than this stunning meadow teal roller blind. There's wild clematis, quaking grass and wild oats from the greek countryside, in ombre botanicals in beautiful blues and greens and printed on a stunning linen texture.

products.description: It's like looking at a beautiful, tropical sky when you look at this ombre teal roller blind by clarissa hulse. products.title: Electric Thermal Luxe Dimout Twilight Blue Roller Blind
products.description: This thermal luxe dimout roller blind is just as sumptuous as it is practical. In a wonderful deep blue it looks great paired with bright blues or soft pinks.
